message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product.  I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to part with it for $14,000. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am willing to pay $13,000 for it.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm holding out for something closer to $13,750. This product is really worth it, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $13,500 for the product.
